page.title: 16THE QUALTITY OF LIFE
page.content: In many ways the quality of life here rests in the peacefulness of the rural environment, though this is often more appreciated by the incomers who have chosen to live here than those who have inherited it! In general it is probably true to say that the pace of life is slow, still governed by the environmental factors of relative remoteness, the seasons and the weather. This suits people like Brian Slack. a professional artist and sculptor who settled here from London in the 1970's.
